story: [Terry] bought a new dress for his daughter [Mozella]. [Lida], who is the sister of [Mozella], is a lovely girl. [Lida] and her uncle [Asberry] went to the pet shop. [Lida] saw a puppy that she loved, so [Asberry] bought it for her.

[Shirley] is [Hedwig]'s older brother. He has never liked any of her boyfriends. [Martin] and [Hedwig] werent able to have children naturally, so they adopted [Zena] from sweden.

[Nellie] loves his granddaughter [Sada]. She loves him, too. [Bart] took his sister [Sada] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Janie] and [Bart] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together.

[Abe]'s father, [Johnie], was unhappy that he skipped school. [Johnie]'s sister, [Arminta]. said he should be more strict with [Abe] going forward. [Arminta] 'father [Hiram] became enraged when she failed to complete her homework. [Arminta] was grounded for a month and unable to spend time with friends.
